page.head.home.title: Ortodont Group
page.head.about.title: About
page.head.meta.description: The Orthodont Group dental clinic offers quality and effective dental services in Karakol. Our highly qualified doctors use modern equipment and innovative treatment methods to ensure the best results. We offer tooth treatment, tooth implants, orthodontics, cosmetic dentistry, and other services. Contact us for healthy and beautiful teeth!
page.home.title: We create beautiful smiles and take care of you!
page.about.title: About Us
page.about.about.me: Elkhan was born and raised in the small town of Karakol in eastern Kyrgyzstan. His parents were simple people who worked in local businesses, and they always encouraged their son to learn and develop. From an early age Elkhan was interested in computers and technology. At the age of 12 his parents bought him his first computer.
